name: Content & Action Templates
description: Defines the UI text fields to generate for each information type and its applicable UI components. Each field includes a character limit and whether it's required or optional.

notification.name: Notification
notification.description: System-initiated event requiring user awareness or action. Channels and fields depend on severity.

escalationPhases.name: Announcement
escalationPhases.description: Initial notification sent at lead time (e.g. 7 days or 1 day before)
escalationPhases.tone: Informational, planning-focused. Prepare users for upcoming change.

escalationPhases.name: Reminder
escalationPhases.description: Sent 24 hours before the scheduled event
escalationPhases.tone: Urgent, action-focused. Emphasize deadline and required actions.

escalationPhases.name: Active
escalationPhases.description: Sent when the event is happening
escalationPhases.tone: Direct, status-update. Confirm the event is in progress.

escalationPhases.name: Resolution
escalationPhases.description: Sent after the event is completed
escalationPhases.tone: Confirming, closing. Summarize outcome and next steps.

fields.label: Title
fields.description: One-line headline stating what happened. e.g. 'GPT-4 service unavailable' / 'GPT-4-Dienst nicht verfügbar'

fields.label: Description
fields.description: Additional context below the title. 1–2 sentences. e.g. 'All API endpoints are affected. Expected resolution by 4:00 AM CET.'

fields.label: Primary CTA
fields.description: Verb-first action label. e.g. 'View details' / 'Details anzeigen'

fields.label: Dismiss behavior
fields.description: CRITICAL: must acknowledge. HIGH: dismissible.

fields.label: Title
fields.description: Short label for the dashboard card

fields.label: Description
fields.description: Brief description — what happened, what to do

fields.label: Primary CTA
fields.description: Main action. e.g. 'Increase quota' / 'Kontingent erhöhen'

fields.label: Secondary CTA
fields.description: Alternative action. e.g. 'View details' / 'Details anzeigen'

fields.label: Subject line
fields.description: Formula depends on severity. e.g. '[URGENT] GPT-4 — Complete outage'

fields.label: Preview text
fields.description: Visible in inbox list before opening. Complements subject, doesn't repeat it.

fields.label: Importance flag
fields.description: CRITICAL/HIGH: High. MEDIUM: Normal.

fields.label: Greeting
fields.description: Formal salutation. EN: 'Dear users,' / DE: 'Sehr geehrte Nutzerinnen und Nutzer,'

fields.label: Body
fields.description: 2–4 sentences. Follow hierarchy: what happened → who is affected → what to do → when. Clear, specific, actionable.

fields.label: CTA button label
fields.description: Verb-first action label. e.g. 'Check status' / 'Status prüfen'

fields.label: Sign-off
fields.description: Closing line with team name. e.g. 'Best regards, The AIFS Platform Team' / 'Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Ihr AIFS Platform Team'

fields.label: Message
fields.description: Human-readable message returned in the API response body. e.g. 'Service temporarily unavailable due to scheduled maintenance. Expected resolution: March 5, 4:00 AM CET.'

fields.label: Resolution hint
fields.description: What the developer should do. e.g. 'Retry after the maintenance window. Monitor status at status.llmhub.com.'

error_warning.name: Error & Warnings
error_warning.description: Something is wrong or needs fixing. Appears inline at the point of action.

fields.label: Title
fields.description: Optional short heading for the error. e.g. 'Request failed' / 'Anfrage fehlgeschlagen'

fields.label: Message
fields.description: What went wrong and what to do. 1–2 sentences. e.g. 'This API key has expired. Generate a new key to continue.'

fields.label: Action link
fields.description: Optional inline action. e.g. 'Generate new key' / 'Neuen Schlüssel erstellen'

validation.name: Validation Messages
validation.description: Input guidance during form entry. Appears inline next to the field.

fields.label: Helper text
fields.description: Proactive guidance shown under the field before the user makes an error. e.g. 'Must be 3–50 characters' / 'Muss 3–50 Zeichen lang sein'

fields.label: Error message
fields.description: Shown when validation fails. What's wrong and how to fix it. e.g. 'Too short — minimum 3 characters' / 'Zu kurz — mindestens 3 Zeichen'

transactional_confirmation.name: Transactional Confirmation
transactional_confirmation.description: Receipt or proof that a significant action completed. May appear as confirmation screen and/or transactional email.

fields.label: Title
fields.description: What was completed. e.g. 'API key created' / 'API-Schlüssel erstellt'

fields.label: Description
fields.description: Details and any values the user needs. e.g. 'Your new API key: sk-abc... Copy it now — it won't be shown again.'

fields.label: Primary CTA
fields.description: Main next step. e.g. 'Copy key' / 'Schlüssel kopieren'

fields.label: Secondary CTA
fields.description: Alternative. e.g. 'Go to dashboard' / 'Zum Dashboard'

fields.label: Subject line
fields.description: Clear subject stating what was completed or what to do. e.g. 'Verify your email address' / 'Bestätigen Sie Ihre E-Mail-Adresse'

fields.label: Preview text
fields.description: Visible in inbox before opening. Complements subject. e.g. 'Click the link below to activate your account.'

fields.label: Greeting
fields.description: Personal salutation. EN: 'Hello [Name],' / DE: 'Hallo [Name],'

fields.label: Body
fields.description: 1–3 sentences. What was completed, key details, and what to do next.

fields.label: CTA button label
fields.description: Primary action. e.g. 'Verify email' / 'E-Mail bestätigen', 'View receipt' / 'Beleg anzeigen'

fields.label: Sign-off
fields.description: Closing with team name. e.g. 'Best regards, The AIFS Platform Team' / 'Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Ihr AIFS Platform Team'

feedback.name: Feedback
feedback.description: Simple acknowledgment that an action worked. Appears as toast notification, auto-dismisses.

fields.label: Message
fields.description: Minimal confirmation. e.g. 'Settings saved' / 'Einstellungen gespeichert'

fields.label: Undo / Action
fields.description: Optional undo or follow-up. e.g. 'Undo' / 'Rückgängig'

status_display.name: Status Display
status_display.description: Persistent visual indicator of system state or process progress. Always visible, updates in real-time.

fields.label: Label
fields.description: What is being shown. e.g. 'API Status' / 'API-Status', 'Connection' / 'Verbindung'

fields.label: Status value
fields.description: Current state. e.g. 'Operational' / 'Betriebsbereit', 'Offline', '85%'

fields.label: Tooltip
fields.description: Additional context on hover. e.g. 'Last checked 2 minutes ago' / 'Zuletzt geprüft vor 2 Minuten'

fields.label: Process label
fields.description: What process is running. e.g. 'Uploading file' / 'Datei wird hochgeladen', 'Training model' / 'Modell wird trainiert'

fields.label: Status text
fields.description: Current progress. e.g. 'Step 3 of 5' / 'Schritt 3 von 5', '67% complete' / '67 % abgeschlossen'

fields.label: Completion message
fields.description: Shown when the process finishes. e.g. 'Upload complete' / 'Upload abgeschlossen'
